title: Could MVP be decided on Sunday? Week 17 Playoff implications, Fmr Cowboys TE Jason Witten, Nate Burleson, and Pigskin Picks!
itunes:title: Could MVP be decided on Sunday? Week 17 Playoff implications, Fmr Cowboys TE Jason Witten, Nate Burleson, and Pigskin Picks!
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Hall of Famer Cris Carter debate the current MVP candidates and which ones could surge ahead this Sunday. The crew looks at the games in Week 17 that have playoff implications. 11x Pro Bowl TE Jason Witten talks about his jump into coaching and his expectations for the Cowboys and Raiders in the playoffs. Kay gives her Top Five Fantasy players based on who still has something to play for this weekend. Nate Burleson makes his regular Friday appearance and discusses Aaron Rodgers and Cooper Kupp's MVP chances and the amazing season of Ja'Marr Chase. We wrap up with the final Pigskin Picks for the NFL Regular season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
